attributes.action: Honour the achievements of the English Women Cricket Team by giving the appropriate medals to all who took part in winning the World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Women English Cricket team has had unprecedented success recently in winning the World Cup, The Ashes and 20/20 competitions.
The Male team who won the Ashes in 2005 all received a medal for their efforts yet the Womens Team (who have had far more success) only a few of the team/staff have received the appropritae medal/recognition of that success.
